name: Isbn-tools
tagline: Formats an ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 with dashes. Validates ISBN-10 or ISBN-13.
body:
----------------------------
## isbn_tools.php:
----------------------------
> Takes an unformatted ISBN-10 or ISBN-13, and formats it
> with dashes using the RangesMessage.xml file from 
> http://www.isbn-international.org/export_rangemessage.xml

> Also provides a validating function.

> Usage:
> formatISBN($ISBN) where $ISBN is an unformatted ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 returns a formatted ISBN-10 or ISBN-13
> validateISBN($ISBN) where $ISBN is an unformatted ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 returns true if valid, false if not.

---------------------------
### example.php
---------------------------
> To test, place example.php on a server with PHP and open it in a browser.

> Enter some ISBNs without dashes like
> 9788992589109 
> 9789868379206 
> and click Submit to see them formatted and validated
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
